mintonetteCup.title: Mintonette Cup
mintonetteCup.descri: Montpellier hosts the Mintonette Cup, the world volleyball tournament bringing together the best players!

pageLog.texteRejoindre: Don't have an account yet? Sign up and start your journey with us today.

burgerStand.title: Burger Stand
burgerStand.description:
Good news! The burger stand will be present at the Mintonette Cup.
You will find a wide selection to satisfy all tastes: delicious classic burgers,
gourmet creations, and vegetarian options so everyone can enjoy.

Whether you are a meat lover or prefer lighter alternatives, everyone will be warmly welcomed. It's the perfect opportunity to share a friendly moment over a good meal while enjoying the event!

modal.connexion:
Login successful! 
 Happy to see you back on the court.
modal.inscription:
Registration complete! 
 Welcome to the volleyball adventure.

blocInfo.descriEdition: The Mintonette Cup, now hosted in Montpellier, has seen remarkable growth and has become one of the major events for amateur volleyball in the South of France. The previous edition gathered nearly 15,000 spectators over three days, thanks to the appeal of Montpellier’s facilities and the city’s strong volleyball culture, notably supported by Montpellier Hérault Sport Club Volleyball.
blocInfo.descriPratiquants: This is the number of people playing volleyball, whether for leisure, school programs, or at a high level. This makes volleyball one of the most popular team sports in the world, just behind football.
blocInfo.descriPays: This is the number of countries where volleyball is represented today through various clubs, competitions, and national federations. The International Volleyball Federation (FIVB) has over 220 member federations, showing the sport's global reach and presence.
blocInfo.descriAudience: This was the peak viewership recorded for a volleyball match in 2024, demonstrating the growing public interest in the sport. International competitions attract millions of viewers and increase volleyball’s visibility.
blocInfo.titleReseauxSociaux: Social media also made its mark
blocInfo.descriReseauxSociaux: The digital coverage of the Mintonette Cup generated 1.2 million impressions and over 150,000 interactions. Organizers aim to exceed 300,000 online views for the next edition, further boosting the event’s popularity.
